addEmployee(string,address,uint64,addres.notice: Add an employee to the calling company owner The caller must be the registered company's owner. The first payment date is set automatically to block.timestamp + interval.

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Chainlink Keeper check. Returns (true, performData) when there's any due payment.

feeWallet().notice: All fees go to this wallet

getCompanyIds().notice: Return list of registered company ids

getEmployeesOfCompany(uint256).notice: Return employee ids for a company

interval().notice: Interval between payments (used to advance nextPayDate). Default 5 minutes for testing.

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Keeper performUpkeep: executes one due payment encoded in performData (companyId, employeeId)

registerCompany(string).notice: Register a new company by paying the registration fee (one-time). The company must have approved the contract to spend `registrationFee` USDC. The registration fee is forwarded to the feeWallet. Each wallet can only register one company.
